fullText:
Brutal Advantage

Epic Tier
Prerequisite: 21st level, Str 17, rogue, Brutal Scoundrel class feature
Benefit: When you have combat advantage against a target but don’t use Sneak Attack against it, add your Strength modifier to the damage roll.

Published in Martial Power, page(s) 145.
name: Brutal Advantage
prerequisite: 21st level, Str 17, rogue, Brutal Scoundrel class feature
benefit: When you have combat advantage against a target but don’t use Sneak Attack against it, add your Strength modifier to the damage roll.
